products.title: Velvet Zest Yellow Curtain

A multi-tonal fabric, their smooth velvet fabrics create depth when catching the light, and can create different looks depending on the time of day. From cosy winter mornings, to breezy summers, velvet fabrics have been a firm staple in home and fashion since the 1920s and 70s. This soft curtainin zest yellow, adds a twist of colour to your home.

products.title: Aztec Ochre Yellow Curtain
products.description: Inspired by indigenous tribal patterns from the south americas, this 100% cotton aztec ochre yellow fabric uses a rustic warm-tone yellow shade on a neutral background to create these stunning curtains. This fabric will compliment natural wooden tones within the home, but it can also be paired with dark navy or vibrant turquoise to create an on-trend colour clash. All their curtains are lovingly handmade within the uk.

products.title: Dragonfly Ochre Yellow Curtain
products.description: Their dragonfly range, inspired by the same winged water insect, combined modern design with contemporary trend shades to create this a highly sought-after fabric. This ochre yellow dragonfly curtain, in a bold and bright mustard yellow colour, is a trending mix made in heaven. Why not mix with teal, fuchsias and other 'jewel' tone fabrics in the room to create a modern cosy aura. Produced from a cotton/linen mix, this blind is fully breathable, so whichever room you choose to adorn, you can be confident that this dragonfly ochre yellow curtain is suitable.
